svg.text: Manage Profile Use Case
Use Case Specification
Use Case Name:
Manage Profile
Actor(s):
Regular User
Description:
Provides comprehensive profile management through a three-tab interface allowing
users to view and edit personal details, track achievements, and review activity history.
Preconditions:
1. User must be logged in with authenticated session
Main Flow:
1. User navigates to Profile page from sidebar navigation
2. System displays profile with three tabs: Details, Achievements, Activity
3. Details tab shows: name, student ID, bio, XP progress bar with level
4. System displays sports preferences with skill levels (e.g., Badminton: Intermediate)
5. System shows personal info: faculty, location, age, play style preferences
6. System displays availability: preferred duration, days, hours, facilities
7. User can click "Edit Profile" to modify any information
8. Achievements tab displays 20+ achievements with progress tracking
9. Activity tab shows comprehensive match history with status tracking
10. System provides view and delete options for activity records
11. Profile updates automatically save and sync across the platform
12. System maintains XP tracking and level progression display
Alternative Flows:
A1. Edit mode: User modifies profile information with real-time validation
A2. Achievement unlock: System displays new achievement notification
A3. Level up: System shows level progression animation and rewards
A4. Incomplete profile: System highlights missing required information
A5. View other profiles: User can view public profiles of other users
A6. Privacy settings: User can control visibility of profile information
